alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Clark; Harrison; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:06AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CLARK...BOURBON... NICHOLAS AND HARRISON COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 AM EDT... At 1006 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Paris, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Cynthiana, Carlisle, Breckinridge, Millersburg, North Middletown, Berry, Blacks Crossroads, Alberta and Renick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
